summary: Completed frontend testing for PolluxKart e-commerce prototype. All major features working: INR currency (â‚¹), country code selector, wishlist, categories dropdown, toast notifications with close button, navigation. One bug found: ProductPage.jsx doesn't disable Add to Cart/Buy Now buttons for out-of-stock products.

ui_bugs.issue: Add to Cart and Buy Now buttons are NOT disabled for out-of-stock products (ID 18, 20). ProductCard.jsx handles this correctly but ProductPage.jsx doesn't check product.inStock

action_items: Fix ProductPage.jsx to disable Add to Cart and Buy Now buttons when product.inStock === false
Add 'Out of Stock' indicator on ProductPage.jsx for out-of-stock products
critical_code_review_comments: ProductPage.jsx lines 283-298: Missing inStock check - should add disabled={product.inStock === false} to Add to Cart and Buy Now buttons
ProductPage.jsx: Should show 'Out of Stock' badge/indicator similar to ProductCard.jsx
test_credentials: No credentials required - frontend only prototype
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working except ProductPage out-of-stock handling. Unit tests at /app/frontend/src/__tests__/ all pass (24 tests). GitHub Actions CI workflow at /app/.github/workflows/ci.yml is properly configured.

wishlist_functionality.details: Add to wishlist from Product page works, item appears in Wishlist page with INR prices

categories_dropdown.details: All 6 categories (electronics, fashion, home, grocery, beauty, sports) with subcategories visible

out_of_stock_products.details: ProductCard shows Out of Stock badge correctly. ProductPage does NOT disable buttons or show indicator

toast_notifications.details: Toast notifications appear with close button for add to cart and wishlist actions

navigation.details: All navigation links work: Home, Store, Orders, Cart, Wishlist, Auth

github_actions_ci.details: CI workflow at /app/.github/workflows/ci.yml runs tests, lint, and build

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are MOCKED with fallback to local data. External API calls to api.polluxkart.com fail with CORS but app gracefully uses local mock data.
